content:
uberEats is delivering free slices of pizza tomorrow in Hyde Park between  and  p.m PERIOD to celebrate its official launch in the neighborhood yesterday PERIOD

Over a hundred restaurants in Chicago are available through the app including Fabianas Bergsteins NY Deli and Harolds Chicken Shack in Hyde Park PERIOD For all restaurants UberEATS charges a flat delivery rate of . which is paid through the users main Uber account PERIOD According to the website the average order takes  minutes PERIOD

Chicago is the thirty-sixth city where UberEATS is offered worldwide and the twenty-seventh city in the United States PERIOD It is in competition with a litany of other delivery options including Grubhub Postmates and DoorDash PERIOD

UberEATS had actually been operating in Chicago since last April as an addon to the Uber app PERIOD This original model operated only during meal times and offered limited menus PERIOD With the standalone UberEATS app service has expanded to offer full restaurant menus between  a.m PERIOD and whenever the stores close PERIOD



Your donation will support the student journalists of University of Chicago PERIOD Your contributions go towards our annual website hosting costs and equipment costs PERIOD
